message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the line item "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period. This is the standard accounting practice for recording the cost of inventory items that have been sold.

In the income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" is reported as 543370.00.

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 543370.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '543370.00'} }
```
